inclusion.criterion: Provision of informed consent before any study specific procedures
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Men or non-pregnant, non-lactating women 18 to 75 years of age, inclusive
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Non-smoker or ex-smoker (quit ≥6months prior to Visit 1) with a total smoking history of ≤10 pack years
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Documented clinical diagnosis of asthma for ≥6 months before Visit 1 according to GINA guidelines
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: On stable dose of ICS or ICS/LABA FDC, for at least 1 month prior to Visit 1, at the doses approved in the country of enrolment
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Prebronchodilator FEV1 at Visit 2 ≥40% and ≤85% of predicted (1 repetition of the test is allowed before screen failure)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Reversibility to salbutamol (per American Thoracic Society (ATS)/European Respiratory Society (ERS) criteria, 2005 ie, ≥12% and ≥200 mL) at Visit 2 (1 repetition of the test is allowed before screen failure)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Demonstrate the ability to use the study inhalation device properly
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Able to perform repeated pulmonary function testing for FEV1
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able to read, speak and understand German
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient must agree to all restrictions during the study
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Involvement in the planning and/or conduct of the study (applies to both AstraZeneca staff and/or staff at the study site)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Participation in another clinical study with an IP during the last 3 months
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Known or suspected hypersensitivity to the IP or excipients, including lactose (Note: Systemic steroid use in the 6 weeks before Visit 1)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Hospitalization due to asthma in the 6 months prior to Visit 1
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 15-year-old boy with asthma diagnosed a year ago. He presents with shortness of breath, chest tightening and cough.
